hero.title: Meet Top Universities at Free Education Fairs Near You
hero.subtitle: Connect with 50+ universities, explore study abroad opportunities, and take the first step toward your international education — completely free.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: From finding an event to meeting your dream university — the entire process is free and takes just minutes.

step1.title: Find an Event
step1.desc: Browse upcoming education fairs in your city or country. Filter by location and date to find the perfect match.

step2.title: Register for Free
step2.desc: Fill out a simple registration form with your basic details. It takes less than 2 minutes — no payment required.

step3.title: Get Your QR Code
step3.desc: Receive instant confirmation via email and WhatsApp with your unique entry QR code.

step4.title: Attend & Connect
step4.desc: Show your QR code at check-in and meet university representatives. Get information, scholarships, and more.
